front.title: Illustrative CDNI Metadata for HTTPS Delivery

abstract.t: The CDNI Metadata specification describes generic CDNI metadata objects and properties as well as mechanisms to extend the generic/ base objects and properties to support additional standardised and/or proprietary capabilities. This document is intended to "test" the extensibility of the CDNI Metadata protocol by defining CDNI Metadata for delivery of content over HTTPS that extends the existing generic CDNI Metadata.
